contributionDescription: OP Mainnet is a fast, stable, and scalable L2 blockchain built by Ethereum developers, for Ethereum developers. Built as a minimal extension to existing Ethereum software, OP Mainnet's EVM-equivalent architecture scales your Ethereum apps without surprises. If it works on Ethereum, it works on OP Mainnet at a fraction of the cost.
impactDescription: OP Mainnet is a fast, stable, and scalable L2 blockchain built by Ethereum developers, for Ethereum developers. Built as a minimal extension to existing Ethereum software, OP Mainnet's EVM-equivalent architecture scales your Ethereum apps without surprises. If it works on Ethereum, it works on OP Mainnet at a fraction of the cost.
pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for making false statements and deception, as the applicant seems to have copied descriptions about OP Mainnet without providing valid examples of their own contributions or impact on the platform.
recategorizeReason: NO, the application is not correctly categorized. It appears to be an individual rather than a project, as the applicant has a personal name ("Herculaz"), which contrasts with the "PROJECT" category listed in the "applicantType" field.
